name: Attrition (ZeeEliteNinja)
description:
Attrition

Be the only one to survive the un-dead horde for as long as you can as your health and ammo have been fused into one.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to shoot

This game is for the GMTK game jam and was made in 48 hours.

ENJOY!

Credits:

Hriday Ajinkya (Everything)
